mapper.select: SELECT * FROM books b WHERE b.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO books(id_category, title, content_short, stock, author, year, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) VALUES(#{idCategory},#{title},#{contentShort},#{stock},#{author},#{year},#{createUser},#{createTime},#{updateUser},#{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE books b SET b.title = #{title},b.id_category=#{idCategory}, b.content_short = #{contentShort}, b.stock = #{stock}, b.author = #{author}, b.year = #{year}, b.update_user = #{updateUser}, b.update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE b.id = #{id};
